introduction.description: With our hybrid new normal, workplaces will have to be rethought & redesigned. Given the numbers, keeping in mind sustainability in the process is of utmost importance.

solutions.title: Furnitures and other workplace needs: Prefer Rental or 2nd hand
solutions.description: As much as possible, rent furnitures instead of buying, use 2nd hand or remanufactured furnitures or source sustainably locally-sourced items.
solutions.additional_note: If you retrofit or change office, think about donating your goods.

solutions.title: Grow your Herbs Garden
solutions.description: Herbal tea has been used for centuries and has many proven health benefits, depending on the plants used. Mint, chamomile, lemon balm, dandelion etc. can be grown indoor or outdoor in Singapore. Herbs are easy to work with. Once harvested, they just need to be dried and enjoyed. Use this garden to raise awareness about food production.
solutions.resource: Learn more on how to grow different herbs from NParks Singapore
